actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to broaden the coverage of home health services and post-hospital home health services under the medicare program.

summary.text: Revises the limitations applicable to home health services under the Medicare (Title XVIII) supplementary medical insurance program of the Social Security Act. Redefines home health services for purposes of such program to include the services of a homemaker or chore service worker.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to broaden the coverage of home health services and post-hospital home health services under the medicare program.
